Interface StationInterface


  • public interface StationInterface
    A StationInterface object represents data from one weather station as at the MetOffice Historic Station Data. Information held about a weather station includes: name of station; position (latitude and longitude); height above sea level; list of monthly observations. You should include a constructor which takes as a parameter the name of the weather station (as a String).

      • getObservation

        ObservationInterface getObservation(int month,
                                    int year)
        Parameters:
        month - The month to search for
        year - The year to search for
        Returns:
        The observation associated with the specified month and year. Returns null if no associated observation

      • getLatestYear

        int getLatestYear()
        Returns:
        The most recent year in which observations are recorded. If there are no observations then return 0.

      • getEarliestYear

        int getEarliestYear()
        Returns:
        The earliest year in which observations are recorded. If there are no observations then return 0.

      • totalRainfall

        double totalRainfall(int year)
        Returns:
        The total rainfall observed in the specified year

      • wettestYear

        int wettestYear()
        Returns:
        The wettest year: the year with the highest annual total rainfall. If there are no observations then return 0.

      • averageSunshine

        double averageSunshine(int month)
        Returns:
        The average number of hours sunshine for a particular month, averaged over all years that have an observation for that month. If there are no observations for that month then return 0.0.
